testcase.system-out: Hibernate: insert into authors (biography,country,email,name,id) values (?,?,?,?,default) Hibernate: insert into books (author_id,description,genre,isbn,pages,price,published_date,title,id) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,default) Hibernate: select b1_0.id, b1_0.author_id, b1_0.description, b1_0.genre, b1_0.isbn, b1_0.pages, b1_0.price, b1_0.published_date, b1_0.title from books b1_0 where b1_0.price between ? and ?

testcase.system-out: Hibernate: insert into authors (biography,country,email,name,id) values (?,?,?,?,default) Hibernate: insert into books (author_id,description,genre,isbn,pages,price,published_date,title,id) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,default) Hibernate: select b1_0.id, b1_0.title, b1_0.isbn, b1_0.price, b1_0.genre, b1_0.author_id, a1_0.name, a1_0.email, a1_0.country from books b1_0 join authors a1_0 on a1_0.id=b1_0.author_id where b1_0.genre=?

testcase.system-out: Hibernate: insert into authors (biography,country,email,name,id) values (?,?,?,?,default) Hibernate: insert into books (author_id,description,genre,isbn,pages,price,published_date,title,id) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,default) Hibernate: select b1_0.id, b1_0.author_id, b1_0.description, b1_0.genre, b1_0.isbn, b1_0.pages, b1_0.price, b1_0.published_date, b1_0.title from books b1_0 where upper(b1_0.title) like upper(?) escape '\'
